default-tcan-mosi.help: Default TCAN MOSI pin. Not used if multiple TCAN interfaces are enabled. This is also the td pin that should be used to instantiate the CAN instance.

default-tcan-miso.help: Default TCAN MISO pin. Not used if multiple TCAN interfaces are enabled. This is also the rd pin that should be used to instantiate the CAN instance

default-tcan-sclk.help: Default TCAN SCLK pin. Not used if multiple TCAN interfaces are enabled

default-tcan-csn.help: Default TCAN CSN  pin. Not used if multiple TCAN interfaces are enabled

default-tcan-nint.help: Default TCAN nINT pin. Not used if multiple TCAN interfaces are enabled

multiple-tcan-enable.help: Enabled the use of multiple TCAN interfaces. Requires more configuration by the application than the single-interface use case.
